channel.title: My Work on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in My Work on Introduction

item.title: Machine Learning Bot Classifier (Edgio)
item.description: Bot Classifier I created and automated a Bot-or-Not Classification Model for Edgio, allowing customers to defend against more sophisticated bots based on a configurable threshold. For our client Shoe Carnival, our ML-powered bot solution blocked 8M malicious requests in one month and reduced security exploit mitigation time by 85%. See details on the bot solution here

item.title: API Body Validation (Edgio)
item.description: Secured customer APIs by implementing configurable JSON Schema Validation + Rules. Above is a view of the frontend deployed for the solution, along with the page for rule violations. See details on the deployed solution here

item.title: Alien Invasion
item.description: Sidescroller Written in C++ using the Qt Creator and an Event-Driven Programming Scheme. This Project was completed in collaboration with Darren Atallah, Weiyu Huang, and Peter Liu. Among other things, I was responsible for handling user input, player abilities, and optimizing program efficiency.

item.title: Connect4 AI
item.description: Connect-4 with AI and Graphical User Interface This is a Connect-4 AI written in Java and implementing a Minimax Algorithm with Alpha-Beta Pruning. With difficulty = 4 and under 100,000 distinct games, this AI beats a random AI 99.983% of the time and loses 0.013% of the time.
